# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow.stochastic_graph

### Module `tf.contrib.bayesflow.stochastic_graph`



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/stochastic_graph.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/stochastic_graph.py).
